bibl.title: The Pathyrite Nome in Upper Egypt in the Light of Greek Papyri
Proceedings of the Ninth International Congress of Egyptologists, – Grenoble, 6-12 septembre 2004
bibl.author: ABD EL-GHANI, Mohammed

bibl.note: The Pathyrite nome by the end of the second and the start of the first century B.C.
bibl.seg: ABD EL-GHANI Mohammed, The Pathyrite Nome in Upper Egypt in the Light of Greek Papyri.

Jean-Claude GOYON et Christine CARDIN (Edd. /Édd.), Proceedings of the Ninth International Congress of Egyptologists / Actes du neuvième Congrès international des égyptologues, Grenoble, 6-12 septembre 2004.
